title: Huawei P30
description: Huawei’s re-badged P30 Pro New Edition was officially unveiled yesterday in Germany and now the device has made its way to the UK.

title: MacBook Pro
description: MacBook Pro 2021 with mini-LED display may launch between September, November

title: Samsung Galaxy Book
description: Samsung Galaxy Book S (2020) Laptop With Intel Lakefield Chip, 8GB of RAM Launched

title: Microsoft Surface Laptop 4
description: Style and speed. Stand out on HD video calls backed by Studio Mics. Capture ideas on the vibrant touchscreen.

title: Infinix INBOOK
description: Infinix Inbook X1 Ci3 10th 8GB 256GB 14 Win10 Grey – 1 Year Warranty

title: HP Pavilion 15-DK1056WM
description: HP Pavilion 15-DK1056WM Gaming Laptop 10th Gen Core i5, 8GB, 256GB SSD, GTX 1650 4GB, Windows 10

title: ASUS Vivabook
description: An Asus Laptop.

title: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: The striking design of the Galaxy S23 Ultra features a significant difference: it has been made with recycled and environmentally-friendly materials. From its metallic frame to the glass finish, polished with cooler colors inspired by nature. Take a look, breathe in, breathe out, and enjoy.

title: Samsung Galaxy Book2
description: Galaxy Book2 is a premium ultracompact laptop ideal for working on the go, thanks to its slim and lightweight design. It offers all the power, battery life, and connectivity of larger-sized devices.

title: MacBook Air 2022
description: The new 15-inch MacBook Air features a stunning Liquid Retina display with plenty of space to fill it with your favorite apps. And the 13-inch model is just as impressive. Both are supercharged with the M2 chip, offering lightning-fast performance and up to 18 hours of battery life. All in a lightweight design that will always deliver its best version, no matter where you go.

title: MSI Thin GF63
description: With the MSI THIN GF63 12VE-026ES gaming laptop, you will enjoy the exclusive Gaming mode, offering you a fully immersive gaming experience. It features a 15.6" display and an Intel® Core™ i7-12650H processor.

title: Lenovo Yoga Slim 7 pro
description: With the Lenovo Yoga Slim 7 Pro 14IAP7 laptop in Cloud Grey color, you can multitask with ease. This sleek and ultra-thin 14-inch device will provide you with the power you need. With stunning visuals and long battery life thanks to its Smart features, it will help you make the most of your day.

title: Acer Chromebook CB315-4H
description: Designed for mobile life, this Acer Chromebook CB315-4H 15.6" anti-glare laptop with a slim 9.5mm bezel offers a larger screen for more productivity and a long-lasting battery with up to 10 hours of autonomy. Thanks to its powerful Intel® Celeron® N4500 processor, it provides low power consumption and fast response. It has 8GB of RAM that can be expanded up to 16GB DDR4, and it also features 128GB eMMC storage.

title: Realme C55
description:
The realme C55 mobile phone, in gold color, features a Helio G88 Powerful Octa-core Architecture processor, making it perfect for smooth gaming experience of your favorite games. Additionally, its 6.72" screen and powerful battery will surely convince you.

Preserve your best memories. With a storage capacity of 256GB, you can easily save your most special moments. If your life is incredibly intense, as we know it is, the realme C55 allows you to expand its memory up to an additional 2TB of external storage. Moreover, it has 8GB of RAM to ensure smooth daily navigation.

Your photos, videos, or simply your internet browsing now have an unimaginable clarity thanks to the high-definition technology of the screen. Its FHD+ 1080 x 2400 resolution provides you with a detailed and crystal-clear image, with the most vibrant colors ever (16.7 million colors).

title: Motorola G23
description:
With the Motorola G23 mobile phone in Matte Charcoal (gray), you will have the opportunity to get a mobile phone with innovative technology.

You will be able to take sharper photos at any time and enjoy the incredible results of the ambient light sensor.

Experience unprecedented audiovisuals. Its 6.5" HD+ display will allow you to fully enjoy all your content and play at an impressive speed. Take amazing photos in any environment with the 50 MP camera system. Quad Pixel technology combines four pixels into one to improve sensitivity in low-light conditions.

title: iPhone 13
description:
Super Retina XDR display of 6.1 inches, Cinema mode adds shallow depth of field and automatically changes focus in videos.
Advanced dual-camera system with 12MP wide and ultra-wide lenses, Photographic Styles, Smart HDR 4, Night mode, and 4K HDR video recording with Dolby Vision.
12MP TrueDepth front camera with Night mode and 4K HDR video recording with Dolby Vision.

title: Honor 90 5G
description:
Choose a mobile phone that meets all your needs, the Honor 90 smartphone has Dual Sim, 12GB RAM, and 512GB of internal memory.

Capture greatness in every daily situation with the multifunction triple camera. Create stunning high-resolution images with the 200MP main camera. Expand your horizons with an ultra-wide-angle camera.

Thanks to HONOR SuperCharge 66W, you can charge from 0% to 60% in just 35 minutes. It has a battery capacity of 5000mAh.

The slim body of the HONOR 90, measuring only 0.78cm, is exceptionally eye-catching with its rounded curves. Weighing just 0.183kg, you won't even notice it while enjoying videos or games. 6.67" curved OLED display. See more, see better.

title: Huawei P40 Lite
description:
Powerful, durable, functional, almost futuristic. The black Huawei P40 4G Lite mobile phone offers you premium technology for a unique experience. A powerful processor, 4G network, good security, almost professional photos, and more. All this and more is what this Huawei smartphone offers you.

Size matters and Huawei knows it. That's why they have decided to create a phone with a 6.4-inch LCD screen. In addition, this screen has a Full HD+ resolution (2312 x 1080p) for you to enjoy your videos in high quality.

The Huawei P30 Lite not only stands out for its design, but also for its power. Its strength comes from its 6GB of RAM and the Kirin 810 octa-core processor (4 cores at 2.27GHz and 4 cores at 1.88GHz). You will be able to run any program and work on multiple screens without any lag. Not to mention that the phone has a total capacity of 128GB, so you will have plenty of space for all your files.

title: Xiaomi Redmi 10A
description:
Redmi 10A features a 13 MP main camera so you don't miss any important moments, a 6.53" Dot Drop display, a powerful MediaTek Helio G25 octa-core processor up to 2.0 GHz, a fingerprint sensor on the back, a high-capacity 5000 mAh battery (typical), a 13 MP dual camera, and a 5 MP selfie camera.

It has a large 5000 mAh battery with an included charger. Redmi 10A offers a high-capacity 5000 mAh battery (typical) that lasts for more than two days, allowing you to stay active while on the go.

Enhanced security. Faster access. Unlock your phone securely, quickly, and easily with just a touch or glance.

The Redmi 10A processor can reach clock speeds of up to 2.0 GHz, allowing you to switch from gaming to quick photography easily and quickly.

title: Realme C33
description:
The realme C33 smartphone, in black color (Night Sea), features a Unisoc T612 Octa-core processor, making it perfect for smooth gaming experience of your favorite games. Its 6.5" display and powerful battery will surely convince you.

Preserve your best memories. With a storage capacity of 128 GB, you can easily save your most special moments. If your life is incredibly intense, as we know it is, the realme C33 allows you to expand its memory up to an additional 1 TB of storage. In addition, it has 4 GB of RAM to ensure smooth daily navigation.

Your photos, videos, or simply your internet browsing now have an unimaginable clarity thanks to the high-definition technology of the 6.5-inch display. Its HD+ resolution of 1600 × 720 provides a detailed, crystal-clear image with the most vibrant colors ever.

title: Xiaomi TV P1E
description:
Enjoy an incredible cinematic experience with the 55" Xiaomi TV P1E LED TV, in black color, featuring UHD 4K resolution, Android TV, and Dolby Atmos and DTS-HD audio technology.

A higher screen-to-body ratio without annoying borders translates into a more immersive and enjoyable visual experience, creating a home theater system for your living room.

This entry-level Smart TV features 4K UHD resolution. With a 178° viewing angle, images appear sharper and more layered, providing an exceptional visual experience.

title: TCL 55P635
description:
Use your voice to search for movies, stream apps, play music, and control your TV. Ask Google to search for a specific title, browse by genre, or get personalized recommendations by saying "What should I watch?" You even get answers like sports results, control smart home devices, and more.

High Dynamic Range (HDR), the latest standard for UHD content, provides a superior experience with stunning brightness, exceptional shadow details, and vibrant colors. Sit back and enjoy incredible image details just as filmmakers intended.

With the impressive 4K display that applies the latest open standard for high dynamic range video, dynamic tone mapping optimizes image quality and range of tones, brightness, and contrast significantly improve frame by frame. The more nuanced content makes your viewing experience more entertaining and enjoyable.

title: LG 50NANO766QA
description:
With the 50" LG 50NANO766QA LED TV in dark blue color, you will experience greater color accuracy from any angle.

It is compatible with HDR 10, HLG, HGiG, Filmmaker formats, and Dolby Digital sound.

It features a powerful 4K Gen 5 processor that delivers precise tones and colors (acting on 576 areas of each frame/ Direct LED). It identifies object motion to scale and simulate 5.1 channel Surround Sound.

Control all your smart devices and your TV by voice without the need for a remote. This webOS22 Smart TV is compatible with Apple Home Kit, Google, and Alexa.

title: Haier K7
description:
The HAIER H50K702UG TV, a 50-inch LED Smart TV, allows you to watch all your favorite content. With a 4K resolution of over 8 million pixels, it guarantees a higher image definition.

The 4K HDR resolution, with its over 8 million pixels, ensures superior image definition. In addition, its screen features a frameless design that allows you to enjoy an unforgettable, unique, and complete visual experience.

The backlight adjusts the power and intensity of the LEDs on the front precisely for each scene. This achieves higher contrast, superior brightness, greater screen uniformity, and very pure blacks.

title: Hisense 43A6K
description:
The 43" Hisense 43A6K DLED TV, in black, will offer you the best cinema visual experience thanks to its high 4K UHD resolution and HDR10 technology.

Enjoy your favorite series non-stop, immerse yourself in the latest movies, or live every moment of the most exciting games. Treat yourself to a Hisense 4K TV that takes you to the center of the action.

Inspired by cinematic technology, Dolby Vision HDR brings a depth of brightness and contrast up to 10 times darker than a normal image.

Enjoy your favorite series non-stop, immerse yourself in the latest movies, or live every moment of the most exciting games. Treat yourself to a Hisense 4K TV that takes you to the center of the action.

title: LG OLED55B36LA
description:
The LG OLED55B36LA TV will offer you the unique pure black that provides maximum realism and infinite contrast.

It has a unique processor designed and programmed for perfect OLED performance. It delivers the highest quality image and sound through AI (4K a7 Gen6 Processor).

Our OLED TVs are compatible with Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos Sound. Enjoy immersive sound and the best cinematic experience with LG OLED technology.

LG OLED TVs feature WebOS23, which is easier, more intuitive, and secure. It allows you to create user profiles and enjoy only the content you choose. They also integrate ThinQ and Alexa and are compatible with Apple Home Kit, Airplay, and Google.

title: Samsung TU43CU7175UXXC
description:
Immerse yourself in a world full of color and live an unforgettable experience with the Samsung Crystal UHD CU7175 Smart TV!

The brightest colors come to life
This Samsung Crystal UHD CU7175 Smart TV features innovative technologies like Dynamic Crystal Color, PurColor, and the Crystal UHD Processor, which deliver revolutionary image quality that will make you feel like you're inside your favorite movies. Enjoy the most realistic, pure, and natural colors. Discover the ultimate precision and variety of colors in every image!

In addition, with Contrast Enhancer with HDR10+, you'll experience a greater sense of depth and color. This technology analyzes each image to create more natural and realistic tones. And with HDR, which increases the level of brightness on your TV, you'll have a wide spectrum of colors and details in every image, so you won't miss any details.

To complement this unique image quality, the Samsung Crystal UHD CU7175 Smart TV has a minimalist and elegant design, with virtually no bezels on three sides, giving you more screen and less frame, allowing the image to take center stage.

title: Xiaomi Mi TV P1
description:
The 32" Xiaomi Mi TV P1 LED TV in black is designed to be fully utilized. With high connectivity, it is prepared for HD content and features Dolby Audio™ and DTS-HD sound. With Xiaomi, you will discover the advantages of superior technology.

This television has a 32-inch HD resolution panel (1366 x 768). Additionally, thanks to its 1.5 GB RAM, you will have constant analysis of each frame to enhance every image.

With the Android TV operating system, the easiest, fastest, and most secure, you will enjoy content for the whole family. Immerse yourself in qualities that will provide realistic experiences with the best image quality.

title: MSI Trident X 12VTE042IB
description: Play at the highest level with the MSI Trident X 12VTE-042IB gaming PC in black. With a twelfth-generation processor and powerful graphics, you'll have everything you need to make your games epic.

title: Lenovo Idea Centre 5 14IAB7
description: Take full advantage of every feature of your Lenovo IdeaCentre 5 14IAB7 desktop PC and work like you've never done before. You'll be able to manage and enjoy all your content without any problems thanks to its Intel® Core™ i5-12400 processor and 16 GB of RAM.

title: HP M01-F2005NS
description: From the brand many trust, this HP Desktop M01-F2005ns desktop computer is the perfect fusion of modern design with proven technology. Tackle your daily tasks with a reliable processor and save even more content with its abundant storage. Seamlessly connect to secondary devices thanks to the convenient front ports. Add a touch of style to your space with this sleek computer.

title: Asus ROG Strix G10-DK75700G073W
description: The ASUS ROG Strix G10DK-75700G073W gaming PC is a desktop gaming PC that delivers phenomenal gaming experiences powered by the AMD Ryzen™ 7 5700G processor. Its high-performance M.2 SSD provides high-speed storage and faster load times for your growing game library. Customize your experience in Armoury Crate, with Aura Sync customization and performance optimization in a single streamlined utility. Gaming is phenomenal.

title: APPLE Mac mini 2023
description: The Mac mini with M2 chip includes an 8-core CPU, with four performance cores and four efficiency cores, and a 10-core GPU. Therefore, it is ideal for users looking for extraordinary speed and productivity. Everyday tasks go smoothly, such as opening apps, browsing the internet, or working with multiple apps at once. And for users who need to perform more complex tasks, the Mac mini with M2 chip also has plenty of power. With up to 24 GB of unified memory and 100 GB/s of bandwidth, demanding processes like image editing in Adobe Photoshop are up to 50% faster than in the previous generation.

title: Acer Predator Orion 300 PO3640
description: With the Acer Predator Orion 3000 PO3-640 gaming PC in black, all your daily needs will be covered. Whether it's work or playing video games, its gaming design and high performance will not leave you indifferent.

title: Sony WH-CH520
description: Listen to your favorite songs with impeccable sound and without wires, directly from your mobile, tablet, or any other device compatible with the Sony WH-CH520 wireless headphones. In addition, they have a long-lasting battery so you can listen to music for hours and hours. With the Sony WH-CH520 wireless headphones, you can connect to your smartphone or any other compatible device without any type of cable thanks to Bluetooth connectivity.

title: Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro
description: The Galaxy Buds2 Pro arrives to offer you the best audio quality with a deep and immersive 24-bit sound that will make you feel the music and all your multimedia content like never before.

title: Logitech G432
description: With the G432 gaming headphones, you will be surrounded by the game environment. Feel the thrill of being fully immersed in the action and always being heard for a complete gaming experience. The large 50mm audio transducers produce a completely expansive sound for a more immersive gaming experience. Finally, your favorite games will sound as they were conceived: astonishingly.

title: JVC HAS36WAU
description: Listen to your favorite music in a clear way and enhance your sound experience with the JVC HAS36WAU wireless headphones, in blue color. Quality and design at your fingertips! With these headphones, you can listen to your songs wirelessly. Its battery has a lifespan of up to 35 hours, so you will always have plenty of time for entertainment.

title: Beats Studio3
description: The Beats Studio3 Wireless Headphones are designed for long-term comfort to match their impressive battery life of up to 22 hours for all-day play. The soft over-ear pads have advanced venting and signature ergonomic pivoting for a custom, flexible fit for any head shape. The holistic design is lightweight, durable, and comfortable, so you can get lost in your music.

title: Astro A10
description: The A10 Headset is Tuned for Gaming with ASTRO Audio, ensuring you hear your game and your teammates with clarity and precision. The unidirectional mic featuring flip-to-mute functionality and in-line volume control provides total command of your gaming audio experience. Damage-resistant with extended comfort construction to combat fatigue means you can game longer and game better. Welcome to the ASTRO Family.

title: APPLE Air Pods Pro
description: The AirPods Pro are the most advanced AirPods to date. They feature Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency mode, and superior, immersive sound in an all-new lightweight, in-ear design. The AirPods Pro are sweat and water-resistant, making them perfect for the active lifestyle. The AirPods Pro are the most advanced AirPods to date. They feature Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency mode, and superior, immersive sound in an all-new lightweight, in-ear design. The AirPods Pro are sweat and water-resistant, making them perfect for the active lifestyle.
